us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.exceptions

Class BoundingBoxException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.exceptions.BoundingBoxException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BoundingBoxException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    RuntimeException dedicated to improper 2D or 3D bounding boxes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundingBoxException()
      Creates a new bounding box exception with no detail message.
      BoundingBoxException(BoundingBox2DReadOnly badBoundingBox2D)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given boundingBox2D.
      BoundingBoxException(BoundingBox3D badBoundingBox3D)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given boundingBox3D.
      BoundingBoxException(double boundingBoxMinX, double boundingBoxMinY, double boundingBoxMinZ, double boundingBoxMaxX, double boundingBoxMaxY, double boundingBoxMaxZ)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
      BoundingBoxException(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly boundingBoxMin, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly boundingBoxMax)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
      BoundingBoxException(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly boundingBoxMin, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly boundingBoxMax)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
      BoundingBoxException(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new bounding box exception with the specified detail message.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException()
        Creates a new bounding box exception with no detail message.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with the specified detail message.
        Parameters:
        message - the detail message.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(BoundingBox2DReadOnly badBoundingBox2D)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given boundingBox2D.
        Parameters:
        badBoundingBox2D - the bounding box 2D to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly boundingBoxMin,
                            us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly boundingBoxMax)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        boundingBoxMin - the minimum coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.
        boundingBoxMax - the maximum coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(BoundingBox3D badBoundingBox3D)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given boundingBox3D.
        Parameters:
        badBoundingBox3D - the bounding box 3D to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly boundingBoxMin,
                            us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly boundingBoxMax)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        boundingBoxMin - the minimum coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.
        boundingBoxMax - the maximum coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message. Not modified.

      • BoundingBoxException

        public BoundingBoxException(double boundingBoxMinX,
                            double boundingBoxMinY,
                            double boundingBoxMinZ,
                            double boundingBoxMaxX,
                            double boundingBoxMaxY,
                            double boundingBoxMaxZ)
        Creates a new bounding box exception with a default detail message containing the value of the given minimum and maximum coordinates of the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        boundingBoxMinX - the minimum x-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
        boundingBoxMinY - the minimum y-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
        boundingBoxMinZ - the minimum z-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
        boundingBoxMaxX - the maximum x-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
        boundingBoxMaxY - the maximum y-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
        boundingBoxMaxZ - the maximum z-coordinate of the bounding box to be displayed in the detail message.
